title: COVID-19: Vaccine
description: Everyone 6 months and older can get the updated COVID-19 vaccine. Staying up to date with all recommended COVID-19 vaccines is the best way to protect yourself from severe illness, hospitalization, and death. COVID-19 vaccines are safe, effective, free, and available across Wisconsin. Make an appointment at a vaccine location near you today! Find a COVID-19 vaccine site
cleaned_text: 6 months and older can get the updated COVID-19 vaccine. Staying up to date with all recommended COVID-19 vaccines is the best way to protect yourself from severe illness, hospitalization, and death. COVID-19 vaccines are safe, effective, free, and available across Wisconsin. Make an appointment at a vaccine location near you today! Information on COVID-19 vaccines Everyone 6 months and older can get vaccinated against COVID-19. Learn about staying up to date and available vaccines. [](/covid-19/vaccine-booster.htm) [Stay up to date with your vaccines](/covid-19/vaccine-booster.htm) Learn how you can stay up to date with your COVID-19 vaccines. [](/covid-19/parents.htm) [Children, parents, and people who are pregnant or wish to become pregnant](/covid-19/parents.htm) Protect the children in your life. Find information on the COVID-19 vaccine for children. [](/covid-19/vaccine-safety.htm) [Vaccine safety facts](/covid-19/vaccine-safety.htm) Get the facts on COVID-19 vaccines, clinical trials, and safety monitoring systems.
